badGateway.description: Something went wrong on our end. The server got confused by another server's response — give it another try in a moment.
badGateway.title: Connection hiccup

badRequest.description: We couldn't understand that request. Double-check your information and try again.
badRequest.title: Something's not quite right

conflict.description: This action conflicts with something that's already in place. The system needs a different approach here.
conflict.title: That won't work right now

forbidden.description: You don't have the right permissions for this area. Contact your administrator if you think you should have access.
forbidden.title: Access restricted

gatewayTimeout.description: The server is taking longer than expected to respond. It might be busy — let's try again in a moment.
gatewayTimeout.title: Taking too long

generic.description: Something unexpected happened, but don't worry — these things happen. Let's give it another shot.
generic.title: Oops, something went wrong

internal.description: We're experiencing some technical difficulties on our end. Our team has been notified — please try again in a few minutes.
internal.title: Technical difficulties

notFound.description: We can't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved or the link could be outdated.
notFound.title: Page not found

notOnboarded.description: You'll need to complete your platform setup first. It only takes a few minutes to get everything configured.
notOnboarded.title: Setup needed

portal.description: We're having trouble connecting to our data service. This is usually temporary — try refreshing in a moment.
portal.title: Connection issue

rateLimit.description: Whoa, slow down there! You've been quite busy. Take a breather for a moment, then try again.
rateLimit.title: Easy does it

resourceAlreadyExists.description: This item already exists. Please choose a unique name or identifier.
resourceAlreadyExists.title: Already taken

serviceUnavailable.description: This service is taking a quick break for maintenance. It should be back up shortly.
serviceUnavailable.title: Service temporarily down

systemNotCreated.description: The platform hasn't been set up yet. Please ask an administrator to complete the initial deployment.
systemNotCreated.title: Platform not initialized

timeout.description: This is taking longer than expected. The server might be busy — let's try once more.
timeout.title: Request timed out

tokenInterfaceNotSupported.description: This token contract doesn't support the features we need. Make sure it implements: {{requiredInterfaces}}
tokenInterfaceNotSupported.title: Incompatible token type

unauthorized.description: You'll need to sign in to access this. Your session might have expired.
unauthorized.title: Sign in required

userNotAllowed.description: You can't interact with this token right now. {{reason}}
userNotAllowed.title: Action not permitted

userNotAuthorized.description: You need additional permissions for this action. Required roles: {{requiredRoles}}
userNotAuthorized.title: Additional permissions needed

validation.description: Some of the information doesn't look right. Check the highlighted fields and try again.
validation.title: Check your input
